item.title: Create short compelling videos for Tiktok and IG - Upwork
item.description:
Need to create videos that will promote ifave.com website.
iFave is a ranking platform that has hundreds of Top 10 lists.
Like top 10 cars, top 10 phones, top 10 writers, etc.
We need to find an easy format to create engaging and cool 15-25 sec videos that would present the categories. Just take all info from the our website. You may download copyright free videos from open sources like pexels videos or if not available just use our images from our website.

For example you say ''Top 10 cars according to iFave user rankings'' - (Then you say) #10  Nissan, #2 Mercedes Benz, #8 Honda, etc.

We do not have any preferences for the format. But need to find a way to make them easily and fast and create really nice and sweet videos. (check tiktok and IG, there are already plenty of top 10 videos. We just need to make focus on iFave).
Whatever works, just find the best solution.

We have hundreds of categories and our budget is 1$ per video.
This trial project is for 20 videos.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 30, 2024 16:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Create simple how-to tutorials for youtube - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for 3 new video creator who will join my team that can make very simple how-to tutorials video's like:

- How to delete instagram account
- how to join discord server without invite

making these video's is taking around 10 minutes including minimal editing. I will provide an example video for you to follow.

If you have a good microphone and are able to do voice overs, then this might be a suitable long-term job for you.

I can pay $3 per video and my goal is to upload a minimum of 100 video's per month. So based on your own pace, you can easily earn $300/month!

$3 includes:
- video creation (1-3minutes long, basic topics)
- editing the text in a thumbnail template i provide
- uploading the video to my youtube channel.

**Also, please send a voice example when you apply. If not, i won't respond to you!!**

Thanks


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 30, 2024 16:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: UGC Cutter - Upwork
item.description:
Wir sind eine dynamische Marketingagentur mit Sitz in Deutschland und suchen einen talentierten UGC Cutter (m/w/d) auf Freelance Basis, der unsere Kunden mit kreativen und ansprechenden Videos begeistert.

Deine Aufgaben:
- Verwandle rohes UGC-Material in fesselnde Werbeanzeigen
- Setze deine Ideen frei um und gestalte Videos, die den Ton und die Botschaft unserer Kunden perfekt widerspiegeln
- Bleibe stets auf dem Laufenden über die neuesten Trends in der Social-Media-Welt und integriere sie gekonnt in deine Videos
- Arbeite strukturiert und effizient, um alle Videos pünktlich und in höchster Qualität fertigzustellen
- Kooperiere eng mit unserem Team, um gemeinsam großartige Ergebnisse zu erzielen

Dein Profil:
- Mindestens 1 Jahr Erfahrung im Schneiden und Bearbeiten von Videos, idealerweise mit Fokus auf UGC-Content oder ein starkes Portfolio
- Ausgeprägtes Gespür für Trends und Storytelling
- Beherrschung gängiger Videoschnittprogramme wie Adobe Premiere Pro oder Final Cut Pro o.Ä.
- Detailorientiertes Arbeiten und hohe Qualitätsansprüche
- Kenntnis der Social-Media-Landschaft und Fähigkeit, ansprechende Inhalte für verschiedene Plattformen zu erstellen
- Selbstständige und verantwortungsvolle Arbeitsweise, verbunden mit Teamfähigkeit
- Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

Was dich erwartet:
- Spannende Projekte mit namhaften Kunden
- Flexibles Arbeiten
- Die Möglichkeit langfristig Teil eines erfolgreichen Teams werden

Bist du bereit, deine Leidenschaft für UGC-Content mit deinem Talent für Videoschnitt zu verbinden?

Dann bewirb dich jetzt!

Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung!


Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 16:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Short Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Short Video
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.description:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BNQ9Z1Bjwes
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=unhgYCHiqc8

If you can handle at least 5 videos per day OR you have a team that can, please send me a message to start today.

Video lenght: around 20min (including interview/reaction clips). Price 1$ per min, 20$ per video. Price per day 100$ per 5 scripts. 700$ per week. 2800$ per month.

item.title: Social Media Ad Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to create a variety of social media ads for a golf training aid. Maybe 2-3 videos per month with a max budget of $100-200/video.

I can provide the raw video content. Looking for quick-hitting ads with text and transitions.

Here are 2 examples that I'm looking for. It is important your level of editing can recreate these styles or this relationship won't work out.
